Template for Carnap Slides

This is a template for making your own interactive slides with Carnap.

The basic framework for everything is bespoke.js.

Navigate with left and right keys.

Swiping will also work on a touch screen.

You can view the slide-by-slide source code at:

https://github.com/gleachkr/SlideTemplate/blob/master/src/slides-1.html

with some extra explanatory comments.

Your slides are just a webpage.

So you can include anything that can be included in a webpage:

Images

Videos

Most Carnap exercises can be included

Deductions

Show ((P -> Q)-> P) -> P

Derivation documentation here

Truth Tables

(The below is a partial table looking for a counterexample to equivalence) 

           --T----F--
           --F----T--

Truth table documentation here

Sequent Calculus Proofs

Press Enter to create a new sibling

Press ctrl-enter to create a new parent

Press ctrl-delete to remove a node.

Gentzen-Prawitz Natural Deduction

See

https://gleachkr.github.io/ProofJS/

for more info on building tree-style proofs with ProofJS.

Models

(this exercise is looking for a counterexample to validity)

Model checker documentation here

Translations

Every dog has his day

where F is "is a dog", and G is "has his day"

Translation documentation here

There are also some basic niceties like progressively revealed bullet lists

  • Bullet 1
  • Bullet 2
  • Bullet 3

And there's much more you can do

  • Edit HTML files under src to create your own slide decks.
  • Edit Stylus styles in src/styles/user.styl to affect the look of your slides.
  • Edit JavaScript in src/scripts/main.js to achieve other interactive effects.

You can also find basic information on installing the slide-builder and getting your slides online in the README

Powered by Bespoke JS, due to -@markdalgleish

For really advanced usage, check out their documentation and examples.
